featured.text: Amy made sure her gold bracelet was secure on her wrist.
Prom night can be a dreadful experience for socially awkward teens or for those who do not secure dates.

As of May 1, 1995, all nationals of the following 15 countries are exempted from securing visas for entry into the Republic of China: U.S.A., Japan, Canada, Belgium, Luxembourg, Sweden, Holland, New Zealand, Australia, Austria, Germany, Britain, France, Spain, and Portugal.
(F) Traveling through several countries before securing protection.

definition.zh_def: 安全的，無危險的；確保或保護某物的。
definition.en_def: Safe; free from danger or threat; to make something safe or certain.
definition.example: She wanted to secure her home before going on vacation.
